name: Battle Box (itch) (Repr)
description:
You're a green square. Shoot bad guys with laser guns to gain points. The more you defeat, the more your score. You probably won't beat my high score of 304126 though. That's impossible.

Proof of an earlier high score (40583):

Game works best with a 1920x1080 resolution

Controls:

A, D: Move left and right

Space: Jump

Left Click: Shoot

R: Reload
